title: EPIC: Daily Engagement & Rituals
description: Daily check-ins, feeding, playing, training mini-games. Create habitual use even when not parking.

title: EPIC: Smart Guard Dog AI
description: Intelligent detection system that learns patterns, adapts to environment, reduces false alarms, and improves over time.

title: EPIC: Social & Community Features
description: Share victories, leaderboards, friend features, breed communities, dog meetups. Social proof and virality.

title: EPIC: Customization & Collection
description: Unlock breeds, accessories, collars, special abilities, cosmetics. Build emotional investment through personalization.

title: Dog animation engine with sprite system
description: SVG-based animation engine for dog sprites: idle, alert, barking, happy, sad, sleeping, eating states with smooth transitions

title: Personality trait system (5-7 traits per dog)
description: Define personality traits: Brave, Nervous, Playful, Sleepy, Energetic, Loyal, Protective. Affects behavior, animations, bark style

title: Mood & emotion system with visual feedback
description: Real-time mood states: Happy, Content, Alert, Worried, Sad, Excited, Sleeping. Visual indicators (tail wag speed, ear position, facial expression)

title: Daily needs system: Hunger, Energy, Happiness meters
description: Three core stats that decrease over time. Hunger (fed daily), Energy (rest/sleep), Happiness (play/interaction). Affects dog effectiveness

title: Dog naming and bonding system
description: Player names their dog, dog remembers player, responds to name, loyalty meter that grows with interaction and time

title: XP and leveling system (1-50 levels)
description: Earn XP from: protecting car, daily check-ins, playing, training. Level up unlocks abilities, breeds, customization. Progressive difficulty curve

title: Implement sensor detection (accelerometer, gyroscope)
description: Use sensors_plus package to detect car movement and shaking

title: Achievement system with 50+ achievements
description: Achievements: First Guard (protect once), Night Watchman (10 night protections), False Alarm Master (low false alarm rate), Breed Collector, etc. Rewards: badges, XP, unlocks

title: Breed unlock progression system
description: Start with 1-2 breeds. Unlock breeds by: reaching levels, achievements, completing challenges. Creates collection mechanic and long-term goal

title: Daily check-in rewards & streaks
description: Daily login rewards, streak counter, bonus XP for consecutive days. Push notifications for check-ins. Creates daily habit

title: Feed your dog interaction
description: Daily feeding mini-interaction. Choose food type (affects happiness), watch dog eat animation, hunger meter fills. Reward XP and loyalty

title: Play & training mini-games
description: 3-5 simple mini-games: Fetch (tilt controls), Trick Training (swipe patterns), Hide & Seek, Guard Training. Rewards XP, improves detection, fun engagement

title: Pattern learning: recognize usual parking locations
description: GPS-based pattern recognition. Learn home, work, frequent spots. Auto-adjust sensitivity (lower at home, higher in unfamiliar areas). Privacy-first, local storage

title: Adaptive sensitivity based on dog level & training
description: Dog improves detection accuracy as it levels up. Training mini-games directly improve false alarm reduction. Shows progression impact

title: Dog accessories & customization shop
description: Unlock/purchase collars, bandanas, hats, toys. Earned through gameplay (no real money initially). Visual customization increases attachment

title: Share dog victories on social media
description: Generate shareable cards: 'My dog protected my car 50 times\!' with stats, dog image, achievements. Built-in virality mechanism

title: Realistic dog behaviors: negative consequences for neglect
description: If dog is neglected (low hunger/happiness), display realistic bad behaviors: eating poop (coprophagia), being grumpy, refusing to guard. Varies by severity. Humorous but teaches care importance. Affects effectiveness temporarily.

title: Create dog breed selection UI
description: UI for selecting from German Shepherd, Rottweiler, Doberman, Bulldog, Pitbull, Husky, Beagle

title: Research GitHub Actions workflow for Flutter CI/CD
description: Research best practices for building and releasing Flutter apps with GitHub Actions. Investigate: build workflows for Android/iOS, automated testing, release management, artifact publishing to GitHub releases, Play Store/App Store deployment options, versioning strategy, and security (signing keys, secrets management)

title: Implement GitHub Actions workflow for Android builds
description: Create GitHub Actions workflow for automated Android builds. Include: APK/AAB generation, code signing, build artifacts upload, automated versioning, build on PR and main branch, caching for faster builds

title: Implement GitHub Actions workflow for iOS builds
description: Create GitHub Actions workflow for automated iOS builds. Include: IPA generation, code signing with certificates/provisioning profiles, TestFlight deployment, build artifacts, macOS runner configuration

title: Add automated testing to CI pipeline
description: Integrate automated testing into GitHub Actions: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests. Run on every PR, block merge on failure, generate test coverage reports, fail build on test failures

title: Implement automated release workflow
description: Automate app releases: Create GitHub releases on version tags, generate release notes from commits, upload APK/AAB/IPA artifacts, semantic versioning, changelog generation, optional: Play Store/App Store automated deployment

title: Implement bark sound system
description: Use audioplayers package to play dog barking sounds with different styles and intensity

title: Implement alarm activation/deactivation logic
description: Main alarm logic with timer, activation flow, and deactivation with unlock code

title: Design and implement settings screen
description: Sensitivity adjustment, volume control, battery optimization settings

title: Implement background monitoring
description: Use workmanager to continue monitoring sensors when screen is off

title: EPIC: Virtual Pet Companion System
description: Transform the guard dog from a static feature into a living, breathing virtual pet with personality, needs, and emotional connection. Core Tamagotchi-inspired features.

title: EPIC: Progression & Leveling System
description: Complete progression system with XP, levels, unlocks, and achievements. Dogs grow stronger and more effective over time.
